sentences.english: Also, he spent his spare time guest-lecturing at University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 袁澍松先生还是香港理工大学的客座讲师。

sentences.english: PolyU Milestones is The Hong Kong Polytechnic University magazine published by the Communications and Public Affairs Office.
sentences.chinese: 是香港理工大学刊物，由传讯及公共事务处编印出版。

sentences.english: Lio Beardsley graduated from the hk Polytechnic University with a degree in photography and is currently working as a freelance illustrator.
sentences.chinese: 香港理工大学摄影系毕业，目前是一名特约插画家。

sentences.english: I am now studying the Electronic and IT Master Course in the HK Poly U.
sentences.chinese: 现就读香港理工大学的硕士课程，主修电子资讯工程。

sentences.english: W. B. Lee, Chair Professor & Head, Department of Manufacturing Engineering The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.
sentences.chinese: 李荣彬教授，香港理工大学制造工程系主任。
